mini edit:I HATE INTERNET EXPLORER!

Make sure your resolution is 1152 by 864 pixels & paint is maximized… ;D

item.title: Paint-Spam (got idea from newbie hackers script) - Seizure Time!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[font=Comic Sans Ms][size=25pt]1152 x 864 resolution required![/size][/font]

All it does is rapidly switch around colors in paint. This is version 1, so you’ll have to choose the paint bucket yourself.
After that, just press Ctrl+Alt+R and you’re off! And possibly on the ground depending what frequency your body can’t handle.

[size=10pt]WARNING: This may cause a seizure![/size]

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Paint Spam

Author = Dizzy/DungHax

Description = Test if you have epilepcy

Version = 1.0

Date = 5/24/06

Comments = WARNING: May cause seizure!!!

/Script Info}

var
x, y: Integer;
Begin
Repeat
MoveMouse(41,778);
GetMousePos(x, y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Sleep(1);
MoveMouse(149,345);
GetMousePos(x,y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
Sleep(1);
MoveMouse(77,795);
GetMousePos(x, y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Sleep(1);
MoveMouse(149,345);
GetMousePos(x,y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
Sleep(1);
MoveMouse(139,791);
GetMousePos(x, y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Sleep(1);
MoveMouse(149,345);
GetMousePos(x,y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
Sleep(1);
MoveMouse(92,799);
GetMousePos(x, y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
Sleep(1);
MoveMouse(149,345);
GetMousePos(x,y);
Sleep(1);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
Wait(1);
Until(false);
End.[/code]

I DO NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILITY IF YOU DIE OR ANY OF THAT SORT. THAT INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING: SEIZURE, DEATH BY MASTURBATION, AIDS, RABID SQUIRREL ATTACK, MAD COW DISEISE, RABIES, OR EVIL MONKEY IN THE CLOSET KILLING YOU 'N STUFF.

Have fun!

Read full topic
